name: Akula Pera
summary: Copywriter and translator freelancers collaboration software.
detail: Connecting company managers with more than 500 freelancers.
Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1 and jQuery as user interface helper. Implemented primitive billing system for freelance users to get paid their earnings.

name: Actual News
summary: Traffic pump system for advertisement platform.
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1. Frontend was built with jQuery and jQueryTools plugin.

Planned to get over 1M of teaser clicks per day from one server, but Yii makes this goal almost impossible, serves no more than 100 requests per second. It was replaced with teaser network server in relatively short period of time.

images.alt: create or update teaser's geo targeting option

name: Teaser.cc
summary: Teaser network advertisement platform focused on digital products.
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1. Frontend built with jQuery, jQueryTools and jQueryUI plugins. Server to provide teaser loading was an asyncronous Python application, built on top of Tornado framework and has it's own configuration interface accessible by WSDL protocol. Operational configuration was stored in Redis database. It also have had special image server to convert images of various format and size to required by the teaser configuration.
After it's being deployed it served more than 50 000 000 teaser impressions and 10 000 000 clicks daily, and didn't hit the limit.
Technically is a clone of Teaser.cc app with different visual theme.

images.alt: create of update a block of teasers
create of update a payment rate

name: Teaser Goods
summary: Teaser network advertisement platform focused on real products.
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1. Frontend built with jQuery, jQueryTools and jQueryUI plugins. Server to provide teaser loading was an asyncronous Python application, built on top of Tornado framework and has it's own configuration interface accessible by WSDL protocol. Operational configuration was stored in Redis database. It also have had special image server to convert images of various format and size to required by the teaser configuration.
After it's being deployed it served more than 50 000 000 teaser impressions and 10 000 000 clicks daily, and didn't hit the limit.
Technically is a clone of Teaser.cc app with different visual theme.

images.alt: create of update a block of teasers
create of update a payment rate

name: Thor CPA
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1. Frontend built with jQuery and jQueryUI plugins.
The application functionality is traffic redirection between webmaster and advertiser websites. When visiting user makes an order on advertiser's website, webmaster gets paid.

name: VideoBil
summary: Bulletin board system focused on video ads.
detail: Off-work experimental project.
Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1; Twitter Bootstrap and jQuery on frontend. Website design by myself.
This project featured special video encoding server used to convert uploaded video files to required format.

images.alt: create or update an ad: common tab

name: ActiveDNS
detail: The service purposed to help users who has domains delegated from more than one registrar to manage it more effectively.
Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1 and many of Bash scripts. It's original design based on Twitter Bootstrap CSS framework.

Under the hood it's worked on NSD (NLnet Labs Name Server Daemon) - very simple and lightning fast domain name server with in-memory resource records storage. NSD nodes was controlled over secured shell connection. Replication time never exceed a few minutes for thousands of hosted domains.
Project development was started in 2011, released in 2012 and worked until the fall of 2017.

images.alt: create or update a news record
create or update a pricing plan

name: ArtStyle Group
summary: Promo website of internet design and marketing studio company.
detail: Website was redesigned and then reworked from scratch.

Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1. Twitter Bootstrap and jQuery on frontend. Featured prototype of visual page editor (unfortunately there is no way to present editor in screenshots - it's too old and fail to execute in a modern browsers).

name: Bogoslovo
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1. jQuery on frontend.

name: Deti v Runete
summary: Promo website of internet security problems for children.
detail: Rewritten in PHP from static HTML pages with basic content management (like news, partner banners, etc).

name: Doctor Lee
summary: Traditional Chinese therapy medical tours company website.
detail: One of the first websites made within an ArtStyle 'site pipeline' with 24h per site deadline.

name: Sibuslugi
detail: My own original design. Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1.
Designed as a collaboration platform for handworkers and their clients under website owner company's supervising.

name: Step Tuning
detail: Very first website from the series of online shop sites made in ArtStyle. Totally produced more than 20 of such websites.

name: Parenthood Portal
detail: Website redesign project. Not implemeted in production, but still looks perfect.

name: Democrator
summary: Web application for problem solving in a democracy way.
detail: The weirdest project in my career. Former website developer ran away with all the code and database, but he doesn't shut the site down. Customer asked to make a copy of data, so I had to invent special crawler to extract it.
Implemented platform seemed very handy, so I reused it later as a template for the similar websites.

images.alt: single problem and duscussion on it

name: Masha Li Tour
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, jQuery on frontend.

name: Meule
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, jQuery on frontend.

name: Moscow Audio Show
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, jQuery on frontend.

name: Rolex Cup Regatta
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, jQuery on frontend.

name: President Sovet
summary: President's council for human rights official website.
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, Twitter Bootstrap and jQuery on frontend. Huge and long term project. Many custom frontend scripts. Content management module was developed from scratch to make any part of website to be editable. Implemented over 100 different type pages in total.

name: Alert Center
summary: Distributed flash alert service focused on missing children.
detail: This project was inspired from upcoming work travel to the United States to visit National Centre for Missing and Exploited Children (NCMEC).
An idea was using my former experience in teaser networks to make a platform to spread flash alerts about missing children exactly in the area they are lost.

Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, jQuery on frontend. Next I've took nginx as a web server and implemented delivery methods with LUA scripts; they're showed very high performance and minimal resource utilization.
Website also featured an API to allow third party developers manage their own records.

At first the project was called AlertService.ru then after being transferred to Vira Technologies company as one of portfolio projects it was renamed to Alert.Center. It's one of my favorites, by the way.

images.alt: create or update flash alert template

name: Retail Company CRM
detail: Off-work project. It's required implementation of a retail company customer relation management system with assets management, sales automation, accounting and appropriate reports.
Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, jQuery with some of plugins on frontend.

name: 16th Session of AES
summary: Association of European Senates extraordinary session promo website.
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, Twitter Bootstrap and jQuery on frontend.
One of quickly built websites thanks to new content management system previously developed in President Sovet project. This one was featured multilanguage support.

name: RTRN
summary: Russian Television and Radio Network internet portal.
detail: Based on content management system featured in President Sovet project.

Actually this project not only single one website, but 89 websites (by a number of russian regions) running on separate domains. It was necessary to implement a system to deploy all of 89 sites simultaneously.
It was a long term project, took more than six month to complete.

name: RTRN Broadcast Map
summary: Russian Television and Radio Network broadcasting map.
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v1.1, jQuery and a lot of custom logic scripts. This web application is very high complexity due to specific data stored inside like broadcast zone polygons or images; they are required to be precise positioned on the map and to be editable by website administrator.
Website was provide support for Google and Yandex maps, so users could select their favorite. Google map was removed later since it terms of use has been changed.

name: Nedopusti

Website was purposed to provide information about missed children in Russia.

name: Vira Technologies
detail: No backend, no frontend (excluding starting animation).

Written in PHP. Implemented advanced website crawler to parse external freelance sites and give output in standardized format.

detail: OAuth2 protocol server was provided user's single sign on point for non-commercial social movement 'For the Quality of Life' (not listed here).
It's written from scratch in PHP with Yii Framework v2.

name: Vira Sketch Book
detail: Functionality planned but never implemented.

name: ViraCMS
detail: The ViraCMS is a content management system software. It's written in PHP language, with Yii Framework and support all of it's features along with convenient management interface of administrators, static pages, images and other files.
It have modular structure and can be used as a base for implementing very huge web applications.

detail: A network of one central and 84 regional websites was implemented using Vira Content Management System.

summary: Ecology promo project of Right Cause Party.

detail: Pilot project of implementing official government website template for ViraCMS.

name: ViraWorks
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v2 from scratch.

This application purposed to provide support to ViraCMS related customers on a subscription basis. Beside the options required for an application of this kind it featured advanced access control lists, separate for project, task and even comment.
One of my favorites.

name: Social Liable People
detail: Website purposed to rising funding for non-commercial project called 'Social Liable People'. It's a part of social movement 'For a Quality of Life' (not listed here).
Written in PHP with Yii Framework v2.

name: Yalta City
detail: Implemented on ViraCMS' Government Site Project template.

detail: Pilot project of implementing regional touristic portal website template for ViraCMS.

name: Yalta Tour
detail: Implemented on ViraCMS' Regional Touristic Portal template.

name: Molodezhka ONF
detail: Written in PHP with Yii Framework v2 from scratch. jQuery on frontend. Quick prototyping and fast deploy.

name: Internet Foundation
summary: Foundation in a popularizing internet for government departaments.
detail: Purposed to promote ViraCMS solutions in government and municipal subjects.
Implemented on ViraCMS custom built template.

name: Studwork.org
summary: Freelancer job website focused on education.
detail: Very huge web application. Frontend part is built on Vue.js and Nuxt.js for server side rendering. Backend API is written in PHP with Yii Framework v2. PostgreSQL used as a database server. Redis for caching and fast access to common used data. Elastic search is used for full text search engine.

achievements.text: special build server and full deploy automatization with Ansible and GitHub Actions
introduced git flow with versioning and scheduled releases
migrated from Nuxt v1.4 to v2 for security and performance reasons
covered over 80% of API code by unit and acceptance tests
implemented Action-Domain-Responder pattern to increase development process
migrated from PHP v5.6 to v8.0
